text: Congrats to Ryder Cup Captain @user for his 6 under 64 in Thursday\u2019s opening round of the Honda Classic. Keep it going!
augmented_text: Oh great, another meeting. Just what I needed to make my day even more enjoyable.
original:
1. Oh great, another meeting. Just what I needed to make my day even more enjoyable. 
2. Wow, I'm so glad I spent all that money on this fancy coffee. It tastes exactly like the cheap stuff I make at home. 
3. Thanks for inviting me to your party, I can't wait to stand awkwardly in the corner and pretend like I'm having a good time. 
4. Oh, you're telling me that I have to work over the weekend? How lovely. 
5. This traffic jam is fantastic, I'm really enjoying sitting here for hours on end. 
6. Thank you for reminding me to do my job, I had almost forgotten that I'm being paid to be here. 
7. I love it when people talk over me in meetings, it really makes me feel valued and heard. 
8. Oh, wonderful, another email from the boss. I'm sure it's just more exciting work to add to my already overflowing plate. 
9. Thanks for letting me know that I'm doing everything wrong, I was really starting to feel like I was doing a good job. 
10. Wow, I can't believe I get to spend all day sitting in this uncomfortable chair. It's truly a dream come true.

text: Congrats to Ryder Cup Captain @user for his 6 under 64 in Thursday\u2019s opening round of the Honda Classic. Keep it going!
augmented_text: I had a great time at the beach today!
original:
1. I had a great time at the beach today!
2. Thank you so much for helping me move into my new apartment.
3. I'm really looking forward to seeing my family over the holidays.
4. This pizza is delicious!
5. Congratulations on your new job!
6. I love spending my weekends hiking in the mountains.
7. The sunset tonight is absolutely beautiful.
8. I'm so grateful for all of the support from my friends and family.
9. I'm excited to start my new book that just arrived in the mail.
10. I can't wait to see the new movie that just came out in theaters.
